page.title: 09MY SPARE TIME
page.content: I have 5 hrs. of leisure time from when I get home at 3.45 until 9 p.m. Mainly I spend my time outside riding my bike or going fishing.I watch T.V.rarely.I have been angling for 4 years now. Sometimes I go to the canal and sometimes to the River Calder.It cost me Â£1 each time I go.The main things involved are knowing how to tie knots and knowing where the fish will be and at what depth. I have a B.M.X.bike which I ride near my house at the swing field. This is near the football pitch. We use the railway banking as a ramp.Sometimes I go along Bradford Rd. to a place we call Devil's Ditch.This is on the old railway banking near Wellholme Park. We do practise jumps and have a height competition.I wear a safety helmet and pads on my knees and elbows.
